name: BuildShooter
description:
Defeat the invaders and collect the materials.
You can build powerful weapons with the materials you collect.

Made for the GDevelop Game Jam #1
This game was created in 10 days.

CONTROLS Mobile
PCMove leftTouch left side of screenA keyMove rightTouch right side of screenD keyShootingAutomaticAutomaticSelectTouchClick TIPS
  • If your ship is destroyed, you will not lose any materials.
  • If your ship is stationary, you can attract materials.
  • Be aware that your shots will damage your weapons. (Except for some weapons...)
CREDITS Music

Title Scene : 強化トカゲ
Wave1 ~ 3 and Z : ISAo
